```css
// Property(ies): iOS: viewShadowOffset, viewShadowRadius, viewShadowColor, Android: elevation - Box Shadow Effect in Tailwind
// Component(s): iOS: Ti.UI.View, Android: Ti.UI.Android.CardView, Ti.UI.Animation, Ti.UI.View
'.shadow-xs': { viewShadowOffset: { x: 0, y: 0 }, viewShadowRadius: 1, viewShadowColor: '#80000000', elevation: 4 }
'.shadow-sm': { viewShadowOffset: { x: 0, y: 1 }, viewShadowRadius: 2, viewShadowColor: '#80000000', elevation: 8 }
'.shadow': { viewShadowOffset: { x: 0, y: 2 }, viewShadowRadius: 4, viewShadowColor: '#80000000', elevation: 16 }
'.shadow-md': { viewShadowOffset: { x: 0, y: 3 }, viewShadowRadius: 6, viewShadowColor: '#80000000', elevation: 24 }
'.shadow-lg': { viewShadowOffset: { x: 0, y: 4 }, viewShadowRadius: 8, viewShadowColor: '#80000000', elevation: 26 }
'.shadow-xl': { viewShadowOffset: { x: 0, y: 6 }, viewShadowRadius: 12, viewShadowColor: '#80000000', elevation: 34 }
'.shadow-2xl': { viewShadowOffset: { x: 0, y: 8 }, viewShadowRadius: 14, viewShadowColor: '#80000000', elevation: 38 }
'.shadow-inner': { viewShadowOffset: { x: 0, y: 0 }, viewShadowRadius: null, viewShadowColor: null, elevation: 0 }
'.shadow-outline': { viewShadowOffset: { x: 0, y: 0 }, viewShadowRadius: 4, viewShadowColor: '#80000000', elevation: 16 }
'.shadow-none': { viewShadowOffset: { x: 0, y: 0 }, viewShadowRadius: null, viewShadowColor: null, elevation: 0 }
```
